Helping veterans and their families get the benefits they deserve.

See If You Qualify Get Your Benefits

Serving Veterans, Spouses & Families

Benefits Consulting is dedicated to serving veterans and providing valuable information regarding the Veteran Affairs Improved Pension Benefit with Aid and Attendance, a federal assistance program offering monthly support to veterans, spouses and surviving spouses of veterans.

Holistic Approach

We provide a holistic approach to the Aid and Attendance Pension to maximize the benefits provided to veterans, spouses, surviving spouses of veterans, and their families.

Expert Guidance

Only 1 in 4 veterans or spouses who are eligible for the Aid and Attendance Pension are receiving it. We help veterans and spouses apply and receive this benefit and others.

Continued Support

We provide long-term care assistance and helping you claim financial reimbursement, up to $2,295 per month, or nearly $27,540 a year tax-free.

If you need help applying for VA benefits or need help making claims, we're here for you every step of the way as a long-term partner.
